name: Space Swarm (Campfire)
description:
Controls W, A, S, D or UP,  LEFT, DOWN, RIGHTMoves Player Left Mouse Basic Laser ShotRight Mouse Burst Fire AbilitySpace BarAOE AbilityEscape Pause Game

Embark on an epic journey through the cosmos with "Space Swarm", the 2D space action shooter that will blow your mind! Experience the thrill of bullet hell as you face off against relentless waves of enemy ships, dodging and weaving through a barrage of bullets. Show off your skills and collect valuable boss loot to upgrade your ship and unleash even more devastating firepower. With pulse-pounding gameplay and stunning graphics, "Space Swarm" is the ultimate space shooter that will take you to the brink of adrenaline-fueled excitement. So grab your weapons, hold on tight, and get ready to conquer the galaxy in "Space Swarm"
